page.title: 10GODMERSHAM HOUSING
page.content: Much of the housing belonged to the large estate of Godmersham Park. Most of these have been sold to private owners over the years with only 4 cottages still being occupied by estate workers and two by retired staff.Only two houses have been built during the past decade but several buildings have been converted for residential use recently, including our vllage shop and the old village school which had become a field study centre. An oast and large barn have been converted in to 4 dwellings at East Stour Farm and a new house is being built of old materials in Eggarton Lane. We have 8 council houses representing only 4% of the housing and the council is aware of the need for more housing for the elderly in the area.
